elementSpec.desc: contains the intended expansion for the entity documented by an patternSpec element, enclosed by quotation marks.
contiene l'espansione assegnata all'entità documentata da un elemento patternSpec e racchiusa tra virgolette
contiene la expansión asignada a la entidad documentada por un elemento patternSpec y marcada entre comillas.
要素patternSpecで示されたエンティティの展開を示す．

egXML.stringVal: "the choice of quotes isn't always unimportant"

exemplum.p: System entities should include the SYSTEM keyword within the content of this element, as shown:

remarks.p: The content of this element is the replacement text for the named entity, including any keywords, and surrounded by appropriate quotation marks.
